lst.name: sentence
lst.str: As the dollar slides downward on global markets and stock exchanges gyrate wildly, the trade dispute involving the United States and Japan once again is spreading fears of a major trade war between the two trading giants for the first time since World War II.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While Congress is trying to attack the trade deficit on one front through a get-tough trade bill promising retaliatory measures unless all markets are opened, its success so far against the budget deficit has been marked by limited progress.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The law has been followed, even though an enforcement mechanism to mandate automatic across-the-board cuts if Congress misses its goal was stricken by the Supreme Court.
